intro: Psychotria schraderbergiensis, commonly known as the Schraderberg Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, often found in the understory of tropical forests. The plant contains various alkaloids, which have been of interest in botanical and pharmacological research.
